name: Park of Monster
description:
【Park of Monster Game Introduction】
After a dark magic invades the oldest tribe, ancient monsters become the only hope of tribal chief to purify this misty land. The chief needs to merge various strong monsters together, complete thousands of stages, set up special offence & defence team to protect and heal this land. Together, the chief and monsters will restore the glory of ancient monsters worldwide!

【Park of Monster Features】
=Merge Monsters, Collect Items=

A strategy game to collect, merge and evolve ancient monster eggs to strong powerful monsters.
Gather sacred balls, awaken all items of misty land with its holy power.
Various buildings, plants, monsters, coins and ores await you in this fun game.

=Mysterious Stages, Attack And Invade=
Thousands of stages to challenge you, help you explore an exciting new world.
Get more mission stars to unlock high-level monsters.
Set up proper offence & defence team to attack for more resources, a different war game is approaching.

=Hand-drawing Style, Amazing Soundtrack=
Hand-drawing items to show you a magical monsters world.
Special sound effect and delightful music to increase your gameplay passion

=One Server Worldwide, Unite Together=
Fight together in one union to expand your land.
Instant chat with auto translation to help you social conveniently.
Discover a cultivate relaxing game.

Download now to begin your quest in mobile legend game - Park of Monster!
